name: My Family is Me
description:
My Family is Me

A virus has decimated the world's population. Luckily, people like him still have their source of motivation to keep them moving on: His family, still out there caught in the middle between chaos and disaster. He wants to survive... alongside his family.

Because he always says, and always will, "My family is me."

My Family is Me is a survival game. You fight dead, you try not be dead. But you are not alone. Your family is all you have! So make everything to make them survive.

Credits

game design / game art / story by
Özkan "MacabreArtGames" Dağ

coding / backend development by
Soner "Makrorof" Sadi

help in game art by
Marek "Agresko" Šefčík

sound effects / music by
Muzaffer "Muzoo" Terlemez

The game was developed from scratch as Ludum Dare 46 entry.  This is our first attempt in the jam. We hope you enjoy this small game. I and my team made most of it on my Twitch channel.
